sense.def:
A stage
je del nekega procesa ali dejavnosti.

seg.quote: In the early stages of learning to read, a child will usually need a lot of help.
...the first stage of an 800 mile expedition.

sense.def:
V gledališču je
the stage
dvignjena ploščad, na kateri nastopajo igralci ali komiki.

seg.quote: She stood alone on the enormous stage.

sense.def:
Igranje in postavljanje iger v gledališču lahko imenujemo
the stage
.

seg.quote: She retired from the stage some years ago.

sense.def:
To stage a play or other show
pomeni pripraviti predstavo neke igre ali druge prireditve.

To stage an event or ceremony
pomeni organizirati prireditev ali slovesnost.

To set the stage for something
pomeni pripraviti vse, da se nekaj lahko zgodi.
